name: 贴吧广告屏蔽样式
description: 2015.11.14更新，去除百度贴吧范围内（tieba.baidu.com）的所有广告，包括各种会员T豆推广等相关内容，还你一个干净清爽的贴吧界面。
additional_info:
更新记录

  • 2015.5.23:一些更新
  • 2014.8.3:去除了贴吧所有可见的有碍阅读，与纯净贴吧无关的T豆，T秀，各种徽章图标主播以及各种推广，还你一个干净清爽的贴吧
  • 2014.8.8:屏蔽百度刚研究出来的捞钱手段--吧特权包，同时将“我在贴吧”和“我在本吧”复位
  • 2014.8.8:修正关注吧与未关注吧的头像错位问题
  • 2014.8.13:修正一些错误
  • 2014.8.26:去除贴吧文字链接
  • 2014.9.16:......

样式反馈地址:反馈地址

强迫症专用，对广告和推广内容屏蔽比较彻底

反馈内容最好附上贴吧网址或者页面截图以及使用何种浏览器，以便我及时排查问题进行修正。 如果你没有高超的CSS水平，请不要将此样式与其他同类样式混用，不然可能会出现各种问题。 这是我的自用样式，本来发到样式站只是为了备份以及给朋友们使用，不过看了看安装数还是有人用的，那.....
css:
/*样式反馈地址:http://tieba.baidu.com/p/3217147002 反馈内容最好附上贴吧网址或者页面截图以及使用何种浏览器,以便我及时排查问题进行修正.*/
/*最近更新日期:2015.11.14*/
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("tieba.baidu.com")
{    
    [id*="game"],[class*="game"],    
    [id*="tbmall"],[class*="tbmall"],
    [class*="tshow"],
    [class*="per_list"],[id*="per_list"],/*直播*/
    [class*="ten"][class*="ears"],[id*="ten"][id*="ears"],/*贴吧十年广告*/
    [id*=BAIDU][id*=AD],[class*=BAIDU][class*=AD],/*贴吧推广*/
    [class*=lot],/*贴吧聚众赌博*/
    [data-dasecondname][data-dafirstname],/*游戏推广*/
    li[data-daid],
    #novel-ranking,
    .aside_region.life_helper,
    a[class*=tbworld]:not([class~="icon_tbworld"]),
    a[href*=tbmall]:not([class="j_th_tit"]):not([class~="icon_tbworld"]):not([class~=img_box]):not([class*=j_mod_item]), 
    a[class*=hidden][class*=icon],
    a[class*=month][class*=icon],
    #global_notice_wrap ~ *,
    .forum_header > div[style],
    .ui_bubble_down,
    .firework-wrap,
    .senior-search-link ~ *,
    .apply_groups > ins:nth-child(1),
    #global_notice_wrap,
    body > div[class*="clearfix"],
    #creativeplatform-datarecommend,/*贴吧推荐*/
    [class*=achievement],
    .thread_recommend,
    .search_form > div,
    [id="pagelet_frs-aside/pagelet/normal_aside"] > *:not([id*=my_tieba]):not([id*=forum_info]):not([id*=zyq]),
    .celebrity,
    .my_app,
    .head_middle,
    #thread_list > li:not([data-field]):not([class*=thread]),
    div.l_post_bright:not([data-field]),
    #top_activity,
    li.reward_btn,
    .j_voice_ad_gif，
    #bonus_forum_aside,
    .firework_sender_wrap,/*放烟花*/
    #j_p_postlist div[data-daid],
    .region_bright.platform_aside_tieba_partner,
    div.edui-btn[data-original-title="付费可见"],
    #celebrity,
    .h01eef0f00,
    #j_p_postlist > div:not([class*=post]),
    #x,
   
    .icon_pre,
    .top_iframe,
    .right_section iframe,
    li.category_item:nth-child(4),
    p.user_card_vip_tips,
    #forum_recommend,
    [class*=icon][class*=lzl],/*楼中楼会员图标*/
    .icon_wrap.icon_wrap_theme1.frs_bright_icons,/*各种徽章图标*/
    .tbui_aside_float_bar, /*贴吧悬浮侧边栏*/
    li.tbui_aside_fbar_button.tbui_fbar_square,
    li.tbui_aside_fbar_button.tbui_fbar_lab,
    li.tbui_aside_fbar_button.tbui_fbar_share,
    .u_menu_wrap.u_app_wrap, /*客户端相关*/
    [class*=wallet], /*贴吧钱包*/
    .u_news ~ *,
    #aside_ad,
    .app_forum_top_nav,
    .p_postlist .l_post_bright[data-daid],/*楼层广告*/
    .topic_thread_danmu,
    #threadListGroupCnt,/*视频直播*/
    .app_forum_top,
    div[data-daid],/*测试，有误杀可能*/
    li.tab:nth-child(4),
    .aside_friendapply_li,/*好友申请*/
    #pc2client,
    .opui-barrage-box,
    .score_num.j_score_num,
    #tieba-notice,
    .item.live_show_aside,
    .r-top-sec, /*贴吧首页推荐*/
     #plat_act_wrapper,/*贴吧首页推荐*/
    .member_rank,/*贴吧首页土豪俱乐部*/
     ul .u_reg ~ *,
    .j_icon_slot,/*徽章*/
    .icon_wrap a[locate],
    li [class*=nameplate], /*勋章之类的*/
    .save_face_bg.save_face_bg_2,/*挽尊*/
    [class="guessing_watermark"],
    div.ihome_aside_section:nth-child(1),
    [class="ui_card_wrap"][style="visibility: visible; width: 180px; z-index: 1001; top: 2324.93px; left: 348.75px;"],/*八五后台弹窗*/ 
    .dialogJmodal[style="z-index: 50000; width: 1442px; height: 1637px;"],
    [class*=u_xiu8],/*视频广告*/
    #pop_frame,/*贴吧弹窗消息*/
    .save_face_bg,/*帖子右上角挽尊*/
    .icon_tbworld,/*个人信息处的灰色皇冠图标*/
    .live_show,/*视频主播*/
    #selectsearch-icon, /*选中搜索图标*/
    .icon_book_link_icon,/*查看我的印记*/
    .p_mall_tail,/*贴吧会员尾巴*/
    .star_nav_ico_group, /*导航栏群组*/
    div.residual_wrap.residual_wrap_worship,/*屏蔽贴吧臭鸡蛋*/
    .userinfo_scores,/*去你的T豆*/
    #onekey_sign,/*一键签到,土豪功能用不起*/
    #j_dimension,/*客户端广告*/
    .edui-btn-medal,/*勋章特权*/.edui-btn.edui-btn-voice,/*语音*/
    li.j_tbnav_tab:nth-child(5),/*群组*/
    .userinfo_userdata ~ *,/*魔蛋*/
    [class*=props],/*魔蛋*/
    li.j_tbnav_tab:nth-child(6),
    [class*=author] .icon_wrap,
    .sign_tip_aside, /*签到按钮弹出菜单的那一堆豆*/
    /*#sign_mod,*/ /*签到按钮*/
    .ui_card_wrap:not([id]) *,
    .card_userinfo_title span[class*=icon],a[class*=maizhi],/*妹子图标*/
    .card_userinfo_wrap .userinfo_head_wrap .userinfo_head,
    .lzl_cnt ~ .user-hide-post-down,
    .add_guessing_btn,/*猜拳贴*/
    #user_visit_card .icon_wrap a,
    .ihome_nav_list > li:nth-child(6),
    span.split_text:nth-child(4),/*发起猜拳贴的分割线*/
    #encourage_entry,
    .fMember_cnt,/*吧特权包*/
    [class*="egg"],
    #sofa_post,
    .reward_frs_list_wrap,
    .tieba_notice,
    .qipai_thread,
    .u9_aside,[class*="u9"],
    li.j_tbnav_tab:nth-child(8),
    li.j_tbnav_tab:nth-child(7)/*签到脚本按钮*/

    {display:none !important;}
    
    
     /*会员楼主标识特殊颜色去死*/
    .louzhubiaoshi.beMember_fl.j_louzhubiaoshi{background: url("data:image/png;base64,") no-repeat scroll transparent !important;}
    [class="threadlist_author"]  a[class*="lv"][class*="tbworld"]/*会员帖子作者图标--会员狗牌*/
    {background: url("data:image/png;base64,") no-repeat scroll 3px 4px transparent !important;}
    #thread_list .threadlist_author a[class*=user_card]{color:#999 !important;}  /*贴子列表ID颜色*/  
    [class*="fiesta_member"] [class="threadlist_lz clearfix"] a:link  /*会员红标题什么的都去死*/
    {color:#2D64B3 !important;}
     a.j_th_tit[title]:link{color:#2D64B3 !important;}
     a.j_th_tit[title]:visited{color:rgb(101, 48, 150) !important;}
     a.ps_cb{pointer-events:none !important;color:#000 !important;}
    .drl_item_vip > a{color:#2D64B3 !important;}
    .drl_item_vip{background:none !important;}/*排行榜里的会员图标*/
    .userinfo_username.vip_red{color:#000 !important;}
    [class="core_reply j_lzl_wrapper"] a[username]{color:#2D64B3 !important;}  /*楼中楼ID颜色*/
    [class*="l_post"] a[class*=author]{color:#2D64B3 !important;}  /*贴子里ID颜色*/
    [class="p_author_face j_frame_guide"]
    {background:none transparent !important;border: 1px solid #CCC !important;;
     display: block !important;
     height: 80px !important;
     padding: 3px !important;
     width: 80px !important;
    } 
    .core_title_txt{color:#000 !important;} /*帖子标题*/
    .d_post_content.j_d_post_content a[class="comforum-swap-words"]{color:#000 !important;} /*修改帖子中关键字广告*/
    .j_succ_info{width:278px !important;} /*签到按钮弹出框宽度*/
    .threadlist_author .no_icon_author .icon_tbworld{display:inline !important;}/*=========================*/
     .ui_card_wrap:not([id]){visibility:collapse !important;}
    #left-cont-wraper{margin-top:-3em !important;}
    /*楼回复首行空行*/
    #j_editor_for_container > p:nth-child(1) > br:nth-child(1){display:none !important;}/*屏蔽多了的那个换行符*/
    /*我在本吧位置复位*/

    [class="region_bright balv_mod balv_mod_user_currforum balv_mod_bright"]{position:relative !important;bottom:-160px !important;}/*"我在贴吧"下面的空白，top值按个人需求可以上下调整一下*/
    [class="region_bright balv_mod balv_mod_user_currforum balv_mod_bright"] + div{position:relative !important;top:-100px !important;background-image:none !important;}
    [class="region_bright balv_mod balv_mod_user_currforum balv_mod_bright"] .fMember_cnt,.profile_bottom{display:none !important;}
    [class="region_bright balv_mod balv_mod_user_currforum balv_mod_bright"] .user_level{margin-left:0 !important;}
    [class="region_bright balv_mod balv_mod_user_currforum balv_mod_bright"] .badge{float:right !important;margin-top:-30px !important;}
    [class="region_bright balv_mod balv_mod_user_currforum balv_mod_bright"] .exp{width:118% !important;} /*经验条长度,自己调整*/
    [class="region_bright balv_mod balv_mod_user_currforum balv_mod_bright"] .exp_bar{border:1px #9DCFF2 solid !important;border-radius:3px !important;}
    #rforum_mod{margin-top:-1px  !important;}
    div.region_bright#balv_mod:first-child ~ #rforum_mod{margin-top:-15px  !important;}
    /*楼中楼表情错位*/
    .lzl_edui_dialog_container{position:relative !important;left:0 !important;}
    .s_layer_content .tbui_panel_content{width:540px !important;}
    /*t豆商城与特权*/
#onekey_sign,.icon_book_msgbox,#icon_book_tab,.j_icon_slot_refresh,.tbui_fbar_props,.d_nameplate,[class*="_score"],[class*="tbmall"],[id*="tbmall"],#union_mod,.profile_bottom,.exp_speedup,[class*="reward"],.pre_icon_wrap,.edui-btn-medal,a[class*="guessing"],div[class^="guessing"],span.split_text:nth-child(2),.tb_poster_placeholder,[class*="save_face"],div.ui_card_wrap[style*="z-index: 1001;"],[class*="month_icon"],[class*="doupiao"],[id*="doupiao"],#encourage_entry,.fMember_cnt,.p_mall_tail,.residual_wrap,.post_bubble_top,.post_bubble_bottom{display:none !important;}
.tb_icon_author.no_icon_author{background-attachment: scroll !important;;
    background-clip: border-box !important;
    background-color: transparent !important;
    background-image: url('http://tb2.bdstatic.com/tb/static-pfrs/img/frs_bright/images_bmg/tb_icon_7d46d43.png') !important;
    background-origin: padding-box !important;
    background-position: 5px -849px !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
    background-size: auto auto !important;
    padding-left: 18px !important;
    padding-top: 2px !important;
    }
     .app_forum_top_nav ~ #container{margin-top:-40px  !important;}
     .app_forum_top_nav ~ #container #j_core_title_wrap.tbui_follow_fixed{margin-top:-40px  !important;}
    .post_bubble_middle{padding:0px !important;background:none !important;}
    a.golden_id.j_user_card.vip_red span,a.golden_id.j_user_card.vip_red{background-image:none !important;color:#999 !important;}
     /*感谢zhuzhi04教学line-height用法*//*来自fuck tieba AD*/
     li#j_u_username,li.u_setting,li.u_news{display:block !important;}
     #com_userbar[style*="z-index: 10005;"]>ul>li#j_u_username>div.u_menu_item.u_menu_username>a.u_username_wrap>span.u_username_title{line-height: 20px !important;}
    /* .u_ddl_con{position:fixed !important;}*/
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://tieba.baidu.com/p")
{
    #pb_adbanner,
    #union_mod,
    .j_voice_ad_gif,
    #my_tieba_mod ~ *
    {display:none !important;}
}
